messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: nintendo/TV/Gameboy
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/19/2001 7:07:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time, diamondair@email.msn.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/19/2001 7:07:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
diamondair@... writes:

<< Just a note to say that the issue of "Growing Without Schooling" that
appeared in my mailbox today had an article on this very subject (whether or
not to limit TV/Nintendo/Gameboy)

Blue Skies!
-Robin- >>

There is a discussion pertaining to this article (letter to the editor) going
on on the TCS for unschoolers list. Again, the kids that I see glued to
Nintendo and Gameboy and TV (my nephews, the after-school-gang, the
over-booked-"educational-activities"-kids) are the kids who have it
controlled for them. Forbidden fruit and all that. :)

Laura

Laura

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: nintendo/TV/Gameboy
messages.msgSnippet: Cool...is this a paid subscription or can we see it online? Vaughnde Lee Missoula, Montana http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com ... From: DiamondAir
messages.messageBody:
Cool...is this a paid subscription or can we see it online?
 
Vaughnde Lee
Missoula, Montana
http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com
-----Original Message-----
From: DiamondAir <diamondair@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Thursday, April 19, 2001 5:06 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: nintendo/TV/Gameboy

Just a note to say that the issue of "Growing Without Schooling" that
appeared in my mailbox today had an article on this very subject (whether or
not to limit TV/Nintendo/Gameboy)

Blue Skies!
   -Robin-
